import React from 'react'; import { useAuth } from '../../Context/AuthrorizeContext'; import { Container, Row, Col, Card, CardImg, CardBody, CardTitle, CardSubtitle } from 'reactstrap'; const Home = () => { const { user } = useAuth(); return (

Welcome to Our Jewelry Store

 {!user ? (

User not logged in

) : (

Welcome, {user.username}

)}

Featured Products

 Product 1 $100 Product 2 $150 ); }; export default Home;
